### Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series for Aviation Replacement Parts
#### Solicitation W8485-237157/D

_____________

##### Tender Information

| Date | Item |
| --- | --- |
| 2022-12-13 | Publication Date |
| 2023-01-13T14:00:00 | Tender Closing Date |
| None | Expected Contract Start Date |
| None | Expected Contract End Date |

##### Solicitation Description
The Department of National Defence invites qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to submit a proposal for the supply of aviation replacement parts for the CT114 through the solicitation W8485-237157/D. This request is open only to Qualified SA Holders under the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.

##### Invited Suppliers

List of suppliers invited to bid:

* Simex Defence
* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
* Rockwell Collins Canada
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Canada West Avionics
* BSF International Inc.
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.

##### Procedure for the Solicitation
The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the invited suppliers. Bidders are advised that GetS is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

##### Information Contact
Ryan Duncan, Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM), Department of National Defence, ryan.duncan@forces.gc.ca.

##### Response Required
Inquiries regarding this RFP should be submitted to Ryan Duncan.

##### Qualification Opportunity
A notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GetS) to allow suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series. Suppliers can submit their request to become qualified to Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader, Government of Canada, Public Services and Procurement Canada, samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

Please note that the Civilian Aircraft Division is currently working remotely due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Thus, the best way to contact them is via email.
